alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garland and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Lake Ouachita State Park, or 15 miles northeast of Mount Ida, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avant... Crystal Springs Landing... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Crystal Springs... Story... Washita... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest
